text: Tirschenreuth (Northern Bavarian: Landgreis Tirschenreith) is a Landkreis (district) in the northeastern part of Bavaria, Germany. The district is located in the hills of the Fichtel Mountains. The primary rivers in the district are the Waldnaab and the Fichtelnaab. ==Towns and municipalities== Towns Markt Verwaltungsgemeinschaften free municipalities #Bärnau #Erbendorf #Kemnath¹ #Mitterteich¹ #Tirschenreuth #Waldershof #Waldsassen #Bad Neualbenreuth #Falkenberg¹ #Fuchsmühl #Konnersreuth #Mähring #Plößberg #Wiesau¹ #Kemnath #Krummennaab #Mitterteich #Neusorg #Wiesau #Brand #Ebnath #Friedenfels #Immenreuth #Kastl #Krummennaab #Kulmain #Leonberg #Neusorg #Pechbrunn #Pullenreuth #Reuth bei Erbendorf ¹ administered inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Municipal association) ¹ administered inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Municipal association) ¹ administered inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Municipal association) ¹ administered inside a Verwaltungsgemeinschaft (Municipal association) ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website (German) Category:Districts of Bavaria
